caption.p: Adaptogens prevents the chemotherapy (FEC)‚Äêinduced downregulation of genes activating production of antioxidant and detoxifying proteins and upregulates genes involved in reduction of oxidation damage via Nrf2 signaling. Upregulated genes are shown in red, whereas downregulated genes are shown in blue [Color figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
